0.Pros: Only pro about working here was that I got a free crew meal
0.Cons: The manager was very unprofessional , he would get mad at you and would cut your hours or wouldn't give you any at all, the restaurant it self was disgusting ! The employees were nasty , they would do things like drop a patty on the ground and put it back to be served to the customers. No one ever washed there hands . It was just truly a terrible experience for me and made me never want to eat from a fast food restaurant again!

1.Summary: "Okay to work at for a little while.."
1.Pros: Made friends with a lot of coworkers, had enough hours, was able to get promoted to crew trainer.
1.Cons: Can be very stressful, understaffed at times, conditions weren't always the best, favoritism and personal problems between others were prevalent.

2.Pros: Flexible scheduling. Can help you to build mental fortitude.
2.Cons: Doesn't add any skill to help pave the way for you in the future.

3.Pros: Good 401K plan, you put in 5% they match with 7%
3.Cons: Employees not valued, Corporate Accounting being outsourced to a Company in India in 2016

4.Cons: Not enough hours/money to live on...Never work more then 30 hours a week...A lot of the workers use/sell drugs including management

5.Pros: Pays higher than minimum wage, great benefits after 1 year, easy, college tuition reimbursement, good chances of moving up
5.Cons: Rude customers, sometimes you don't get a break, can be stressful.

6.Pros: Easy, free food, benefits none for part time
6.Cons: Packed always,rude customers for no reason

7.Pros: Fast paced. Work with many great people. Free meals! Lots of opportunities for advancement.
7.Cons: No personal life. Lots of hours. Always on call.

8.Summary: "A job till you find a better job"
8.Pros: Basic labor, you repeat the same actions over and over for an 8 hour shift.
8.Cons: Really repetitive, so much so that it ends up not just physically draining, but also mentally draining.

9.Cons: negative environment, lack of respect, no room to grow, unprofessional
